title: Age of exploration: Spanish explorers
creator_credit: Robert H. Black and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Depicts the discovery of America, through the eyes of the Spanish explorers. Discusses Spain’s reasons for exploration and shows the conquests of Cortez, Pizarro and others in the New World.
creator_credit_for_label: Robert H. Black and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
